name: v1
description: - `styles.css` – Consolidated tokens, components, layouts, and themes. - `app.js` – Unified application controller plus page initialisers. - `customer/account.html` – Customer portal entry point (legacy `customer/index.html` redirects here). - `admin/` – Dedicated admin console pages (`dashboard`, `menu-management`, `reports`, `messaging`). - `manifest.json` & `sw.js` – PWA manifest and service worker for offline caching.
